author: Itachi Uchiha
quote: People's lives don't end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.

author: Levi Ackerman
quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless.

author: Goku
quote: Power comes in response to a need, not a desire.

author: Lelouch Lamperouge
quote: You have to destroy before you can create.

author: Edward Elric
quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless.

author: Light Yagami
quote: He who strikes first wins.

author: Roronoa Zoro
quote: You should enjoy the little detours. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.

author: Kenpachi Zaraki
quote: You really think you can beat me just because you try hard?

author: Jiraiya
quote: A person grows up when he has to take responsibility for something bigger than himself.

author: Kenshin Himura
quote: You can always die. It's living that takes real courage.

author: Monkey D. Luffy
quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.

author: Spike Spiegel
quote: Whatever happens, happens.

author: Shoyo Hinata
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Roy Mustang
quote: It's not wrong to dream. But you have to work hard to make it come true.

author: Sasuke Uchiha
quote: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil’s fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.

author: Killua Zoldyck
quote: When I say it doesn’t hurt me, that means I can bear it.

author: Madara Uchiha
quote: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this accursed world.

author: Naruto Uzumaki
quote: Hard work is worthless for those that don’t believe in themselves.

author: Zero Two
quote: I'm the happiest when I'm with you.

author: Saitama
quote: I’m not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to.

author: Vegeta
quote: Push through the pain. Giving up hurts more.

author: Eren Yeager
quote: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!

author: Yusuke Urameshi
quote: A lesson learned the hard way is a lesson remembered.

author: Gintoki Sakata
quote: The country? The sky? I don’t give a damn. I’ll protect my friends.

author: Ash Ketchum
quote: A Caterpie may change into a Butterfree, but the heart that beats inside remains the same.

author: Vash the Stampede
quote: The ticket to the future is always open.

author: Ichigo Kurosaki
quote: If you give up now, you’re the one who lost.

author: Reigen Arataka
quote: You’re not special. But that’s okay.

author: Homura Akemi
quote: No matter how many times I repeat this, I’ll save you.

author: Kakashi Hatake
quote: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.

author: All Might
quote: It’s not bad to dream. But you also have to consider what’s realistic.

author: Shoyo Hinata
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

author: Makunouchi Ippo
quote: It’s not about winning or losing, it’s about the effort.

author: Shinji Ikari
quote: I mustn’t run away. I mustn’t run away.

author: Kaneki Ken
quote: It’s not the world that’s messed up; it’s those of us in it.

author: Holo
quote: When you are experienced, you can become overly confident and such confidence can prove fatal.

author: Erwin Smith
quote: The only thing we're allowed to do is believe. We can't change anything.

author: Tomoya Okazaki
quote: You should enjoy the little detours. Because that’s where you’ll find the things more important than what you want.

author: Saber
quote: I am the bone of my sword.

author: Himura Kenshin
quote: You can always die. It’s living that takes real courage.

author: Dazai Osamu
quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.

author: Natsu Dragneel
quote: Power isn’t determined by your size, but by the size of your heart and dreams.

author: Hachiman Hikigaya
quote: Loneliness is a kind of freedom.

author: Alucard
quote: The only thing you and I have in common is that we’re both monsters.

author: Yoruichi Shihouin
quote: A lesson learned the hard way is a lesson remembered.

author: Kaori Miyazono
quote: Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going.

author: Inuyasha
quote: I want to be with you. Now and forever.

author: Shanks
quote: By experiencing both, victory and defeat, running away and shedding tears, a man will become a man.

author: Rem
quote: Even if you’re weak, there are times when you can do things only because you’re weak.

author: Gojou Satoru
quote: Throughout heaven and earth, I alone am the honored one.

author: Shigeo Kageyama
quote: It's okay to run away if it means staying true to yourself.

author: Kamina
quote: Believe in the you that believes in yourself.
